SAVE THE DATE: September 9th from 10:00 - 3:00 is a Bolts Blood Drive in our expansive community room! This event is open to students 16+ years old and all parents and community members. Please share on your feeds and sign up today here: https://tinyurl.com/boltsblooddrive

Why should you give?
- You get $10!
- You give life saving blood!
- You earn needed funds for our school!
- You get a FREE antibody test (for Covid19).
- Students earn an hour of community service
- Students can also earn a red cord to wear at graduation after giving blood at three different drives.
- We will host a blood drive 4 more times this year after the proper amount of time has passed for giving blood again, so you can always count on a consistent time and place to give. You can even earn rewards through TBC rewards the more you give!
- Did we mention this benefits our school and our community?

Masks and social distancing required.

Donate on 9/9! Sign up today here: https://tinyurl.com/boltsblooddrive

‚Äî
Jessica Fine is starting with the FSI team this year. She recently went back to school to get her teaching credentials at UNC Asheville. Prior to that, she graduated summa cum laude from the University of Arkansas where she majored in French and minored in math and international business. She also received a Masters in Business Taxation from the University of Southern California. Jessica has spent the last 17 years in public accounting and was a tax partner for the last four of those years. Her client base was primarily international private equity firms, so she got to puzzle through exciting and challenging international tax issues. She has always loved numbers and math and can‚Äôt wait to share that passion with her students. When she isn‚Äôt learning more about math (because there is always more to learn), she likes to play the piano, garden, and play fetch with her dog Kali.
